div.p: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate if a primary source of validated data has the capacity to send validation details directly to a validated healthcare directory.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-validation
CodeDisplay
pushyesYesThe primary source validation can be achieved via a push of data from the source of that information.
pushnoNoThe primary source validation cannot be achieved via a push of data from the source of that information.
pushundeterminedUndeterminedIt is if undetermined if primary source validation can be achieved via a push of data from the source of that information.

description.value: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate if a primary source of validated data has the capacity to send validation details directly to a validated healthcare directory.
